parse.title: The Lord of the Rings Fan Club

links.*: The Lord of the Rings (film series)
The Lord of the Rings Fan Club Official Movie Magazine

wikitext.*:
'''The Lord of the Rings Fan Club''' was an official club of [[The Lord of the Rings (film series)|''The Lord of the Rings'' (film series)]]. [[Decipher]] ran the club which consisted of 6 magazine issues a year for 3 years, forums, and a store.
